First of all, yes, I am a TF2 player and I've spent a good amount of money and time on that game. However, this does NOT affect my review on this game whatsoever.

I've played Overwatch 2 with small breaks in between since launch. I've played every update, tried out every new mechanic and hero. And now I finally got to play it on Steam. Except it sucks.

Blizzard tried their own take at a PvE mode which is NOT what we were promised at all. The new PvE only allows you to pick from select 4 heroes and nobody else. You also do not get character upgrades which were supposed to be a big part of this "Mann vs Machine" type update.

The core game keeps getting updated with heroes nobody asked for and nobody even uses. Most of the new heroes are just copy pasting old heroes' abilities in a mix n' match manner to "keep it fresh".

The game has low replayability, as matches usually go the exact same way. If your team is better, the other team has lost. If the other team is better, you already lost. The meta keeps you away from playing the character you want, and discourages you from doing your own thing by making abilities completely OP when they're targeted at you. 

I've only managed to spend a single 10 minutes in this game and it was NOT fun at all. I've got yelled at for playing the hero i wanted, and i got reported on top of that. This game is a HUGE mess.
